thread.title: New DoomEdit Clean SoundShaders pak file download

post.author: Eutectic
post.body:
Hi everybody,

The presence of broken sound shaders in the Editor's sound selection dialog was nagging me, especially the useless clutter it created, however mild. So I decided to clean those up too

============================

This pk4 file contains cleaned up .sndshd sound shader files in which all the broken sound shaders (shaders which refer to inexistent sound files) were commented out.

Putting this PAK file in your /base folder has the positive effect of preventing those broken shaders from appearing in the sound shader list of the Editor's sound selection dialog therefore alleviating the confusion as to which ones work and which ones don't (without having to try to Play each and every one in the list to find out).

Make sure you also download my latest Clean Defs PAK (also available for download from PC Gamemods - link below) since it contains the cleaned up sound shaders for the Sentry character (char_sentry.def). You need both pk4 files for a completely clean sound shader list in the editor.

Download:
Latest CleanDefs PAK V3
Clean Sound Shaders PAK

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
Another keeper!

Hey, how about cleaning my apartment now...?

Thanks for all the Eutectic Clean Paks!

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body: When we get AVs back I suggest you use this...

post.author: Eutectic
post.body:
ROFLMAO!!!!

Good one rich. Speaking of keepers, this one definitely qualifies.

post.author: Mn
post.body: The link is broken

post.author: Sebazzz
post.body:
New link: http://www.pcgamemods.com/mod/8625.html

I dont know whether it's compatible with 1.3

BTW. Everything that was
http://www.pcgamemods.com/xxxx/
is now
http://www.pcgamemods.com/mod/xxxx.html

post.author: Justice
post.body: The link is broken, would anyone happen to have this? I know this is an old thread, so I apologize for the bump, but I really need this download. Thanks.
